channel.title: [317]Skillcape Emotes[317]
channel.description: So, uhmm I added the skillcape emotes and everything to my client. I had to create a new file, class20_sub1.java. Now, these are the emotes. No errors, gfx's work fine. Now when I do the emote it's all weird. It like stretches out my head and body on everyone. I have the correct animations and everything in my client class. I followed valentino's tut for this. It worked before, but now it doesn't. It's the animation not the gfx. Can someone give me the correct animations for it. Here's mine: http://SageScapePk.com/Class20_Sub1.java

item.title: [317]Skillcape Emotes[317]
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

So, uhmm I added the skillcape emotes and everything to my client. I had to create a new file, class20_sub1.java. Now, these are the emotes.
No errors, gfx’s work fine. Now when I do the emote it’s all weird. It like stretches out my head and body on everyone. I have the correct animations and everything in my client class. I followed valentino’s tut for this. It worked before, but now it doesn’t. It’s the animation not the gfx. Can someone give me the correct animations for it. Here’s mine: http://SageScapePk.com/Class20_Sub1.java
